LanguageData.Apparel_AdvancedHelmet.label: combat helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_AdvancedHelmet.description: A lightweight combat helmet made with kevlar, reinforced with steel and components to protect the wearer's frontal part of the skull. Not effective against blunt weapons.
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmorHelmet.label: power helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmorHelmet.description: A power armor helmet worn by elite marines, with a built-in status computer and layered plasteel-weave plates.\n\nArmor and helmets like this is often used by heavy assault shock troopers and imperial janissaries of advanced civilizations, rapid-incursion orbital drop pod assault troopers and space navy marines.
LanguageData.Apparel_SimpleHelmet.description: A simple standard-issue helmet which gives moderate protection against sharp attacks. Somewhat protective against blunt weapons.
